resources.string:
Wojtek is a 35-year-old personal trainer who enjoys finger painting, vandalising bus stops and escapology. He is considerate and friendly, but can also be very unkind and a bit stingy.
He is English who defines himself as straight. He has a post-graduate degree in sports science. He is obsessed with colouring in and bottled water.
Physically, Mark is in pretty good shape. He is average-height with brown skin, black hair and green eyes.
He grew up in a middle class neighbourhood. He was raised in a happy family home with two loving parents.
He is currently in a relationship with Monica Keir Joseph. Monica is 9 years older than him and works as a chef.
Mark has one child with girlfriend Monica: Lenny aged 4.
Marks best friend is a personal trainer called Angus Read. They get on well most of the time. He also hangs around with Garfield Griffin and Cameron Morrison. They enjoy going to the movies together.
